businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî Singapore-based global internet company
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a Singapore-based global tech company operating e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee) across Southeast Asia, Latin America, and Taiwan. TTM revenue $21.04B (+35.8% YoY), Q3 net income $375M (+145% YoY). Q4 2025 earnings due 3/3 ‚Äî consensus EPS $0.62. Sustainable Growth Advisers opened a new position, and TIKR highlighted 'Net income jumped 145%, analysts see 75% upside'. Trading 45.6% below 52-week high.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce commissions, advertising, logistics (SPX Express) ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: Free Fire in-game sales, publishing ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2%), bookings $775M (+51%)
Monee (fmr SeaMoney): Digital payments, lending, banking, insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8%)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce in SE Asia & Latin America (2024 SE Asia GMV 52%)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale (bookings +51% YoY)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia & Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: EPS $2.29. Reasonable for high-growth emerging tech

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E
keyMetrics.interpretation: FY2026 EPS $4.27 expected. Attractive vs growth rate

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth
keyMetrics.interpretation: 3 consecutive quarters of 30%+ growth. Q4 earnings 3/3

growthDrivers.title: Q4 Earnings 3/3 ‚Äî Key Catalyst
growthDrivers.description: Reporting pre-market 3/3. Consensus EPS $0.62. Shopee GMV growth and Monee profitability confirmation could trigger re-rating. 4th consecutive 30%+ growth expected.

growthDrivers.title: Sustainable Growth Advisers Opens New Position
growthDrivers.description: SGA initiated a new SE position, focusing on the integrated e-commerce/payments/entertainment platform's long-term value.

growthDrivers.title: TIKR: 'Net Income +145%, Stock -46% From High'
growthDrivers.description: Q3 revenue $6B (+38% YoY), net income $375M (+145%). 26 analysts average target $181.49. Extreme disconnect between fundamentals and price.

growthDrivers.title: Shopee SE Asia GMV 52% ‚Äî Dominant #1 Expanding
growthDrivers.description: 2024 SE Asia GMV share 52% (up from 48%). Captured $12B of $14B total new GMV.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: Integrated SE Asia e-commerce, gaming, and fintech ecosystem is the core moat. Shopee/Monee/Garena cross-synergies and proprietary logistics (SPX Express) create barriers. GMV 52% vs #2 TikTok Shop (~18%).

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network with SPX Express logistics. 2024 SE Asia GMV 52%.
Optimized for 11 SE Asian markets' languages, payments, logistics, regulations. Strong local edge vs Temu, Amazon.
Integrated e-commerce/payments/lending/gaming data for AI personalization. Enhanced by Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: SE Asia e-commerce #2, GMV ~18%. Strong in live commerce.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: Fallen to #3 in SE Asia. Overtaken by TikTok Shop.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-cost cross-border. Expanding in SE Asia and Brazil. MAU +55%.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: Latin America #1. Direct competition with Shopee in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: SE Asia super app. Indirect fintech competition with Monee.

recentNews.headline: Sustainable Growth Advisers Opens New SE Position
recentNews.significance: Focused on integrated platform strategy and margin improvement potential. Institutional inflow signal.

recentNews.headline: TIKR: 'Net Income +145%, Analysts See 75% Upside'
recentNews.significance: Q3 revenue $6B (+38%), net income +145%. 26 analysts target $181.49. 46% below 52-week high.

recentNews.headline: Q4 Earnings Preview ‚Äî Consensus EPS $0.62, Due 3/3
recentNews.significance: TradingView earnings preview. Shopee momentum vs credit cost concerns.

recentNews.headline: Insider Monkey: 'What Makes Sea Limited an Investment Bet'
recentNews.significance: Highlights Shopee GMV 52%, Monee fintech growth, PEG 0.40 undervaluation.

recentNews.headline: SE -2.2% ‚Äî Inflation Surprise Hits Emerging Growth
recentNews.significance: PPI beat expectations. Negative for emerging market growth stocks. Wait-and-see ahead of earnings.

analystOpinions.notableComment: 26 analysts unanimous Buy/Strong Buy. TIKR consensus $181.49 (+67%). SGA new position. Q4 earnings beat could trigger re-rating.

risks.title: Q4 Earnings Uncertainty ‚Äî Credit Costs and FX Headwinds
risks.description: 3/3 earnings. Rising credit costs, higher OpEx, SE Asian currency weakness.

risks.title: 46% Below 52-Week High
risks.description: $199‚Üí$108. Below both 50-day and 200-day SMAs. Technical downtrend.

risks.title: Inflation Surprise ‚Äî Emerging Growth Weakness
risks.description: PPI beat pushing back rate cut expectations. Negative for emerging market growth.

risks.title: Temu and TikTok Shop Competition Intensifying
risks.description: SE Asian e-commerce competition heating up. Potential Shopee margin pressure.

risks.title: Gaming Revenue Share Declining
risks.description: Garena's revenue contribution shrinking. Free Fire sustainability uncertain.

buyReasons.title: PEG 0.40 ‚Äî Extreme Undervaluation vs Growth
buyReasons.rationale: 35%+ growth at P/E 47. TIKR: '75% upside'. Rare valuation among growth stocks.

buyReasons.title: Q4 Earnings Catalyst (3/3) + SGA New Position
buyReasons.rationale: Institutional inflows + earnings surprise potential. Re-rating catalysts concentrated.

buyReasons.title: 26 Analysts Unanimous Buy ‚Äî Consensus +67%
buyReasons.rationale: Target $181.49. Maximum upside potential among coverage.

buyReasons.title: Net Cash $5.66B + P/FCF 15x
buyReasons.rationale: SE Asia's largest e-commerce cash generation. Ample valuation safety margin.

overallOpinion: Sea Limited closed at $108.45, trading 46% below its 52-week high. Q4 earnings on 3/3 is the make-or-break catalyst.
PEG 0.40 and P/FCF 15x represent extreme undervaluation for a 35%+ growth company. 26 unanimous Buy ratings and SGA's new position signal institutional confidence.
The key is 3/3 Q4 earnings. Beat on consensus EPS $0.62 could trigger re-rating. However, credit cost increases and FX headwinds are near-term downside risks.
